title: BookMySched
description: BookMySched is a web-based scheduling system that offers a user friendly, easy to use scheduler with elegant UI. It provides a complete solution for appointment management. It is highly scalable, it can be used by multiple organzations.
features: Superadmin​ - ​ ​ ​ Superadmin​ ​ has​ ​ total​ ​ control​ ​ of​ ​ the​ ​ system.​ ​ It​ ​ has​ ​ the​ ​ ability​ ​ to​ ​ view,​ ​ edit, and​ ​ delete​ ​ organizations​ ​ from​ ​ the​ ​ system
Admin​ ​ - ​ ​ Each organization​ ​has an admin who​ ​ can add,​ ​ edit​ ​ and​ ​ remove​ ​ employees​, ​ define employees’​ work schedule etc
Employee​ ​ - ​ ​ Employees​ ​ of​ the organization​ ​ can​ ​ view​ ​ the​ ​ calendar,​ ​ book,​ ​ reschedule or​ ​ cancel​ ​ appointments
Services​ ​ - ​ ​ Admins​ ​ can​ ​ add​, edit or​ ​ remove​ ​ services of their organization.​ ​ Customers​ ​ will​ ​ be​ ​ charged​ ​ according​ ​ to the​ ​ services​ ​ they​ ​ take
History​ ​ - ​ ​ All​ ​ the​ ​ past​ ​ appointments,​ ​ including​ ​ canceled​ ​ or​ ​ rescheduled​ ​ appointments, can​ ​ be​ ​ viewed​ ​ with​ ​ a ​ ​ date​ ​ picker

Search​ ​ - ​ ​ A​ fully-functional​ search​ feature​ ​ for​ ​ searching​ ​ database​ ​ records​ ​ for appointments,​ ​ users,​ ​ clients​ ​ etc​ ​ based​ ​ on​ ​ the​ ​ authorization​ ​ of​ ​ the​ ​ logged​ ​ in​ ​ user

title: Pizzastore Dashboard
description: A Java Web Application that tracks various expenses and financial statistics of a pizza store and displays the data in beautiful graphs built using HighCharts JS library.
features: Relational database designed in Microsoft SQL Server to store financial figures
jQuery and HighCharts JS used to dynamically build charts on page load
Filters provided to sort and filter data and re-display the results
Object-oriented design used to encapsulate different operations, such as, handling HTTP Requests, retriving data from database, disptching data to jsp pages etc

title: Tic Tac Toe Game
description: An ASP.Net web application that lets the user play a game of Tic Tac Toe against computer. A simple and fun web based game that I made for class assignment
features: Player gets really challenging moves from computer
Computer counters player's moves to win
